titles: The panges of loue and louers ftts [sic]
author: Elderton, William, d. 1571.
place: Jmprynted at London, in Smithfield in the parish of Saynt Barthelmewes Hospitall :
date: An. Dni. M.D.lix. xxii. Mar. [1559, Mar. 22]
notes: Reproductions of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
